bientity_action.description: The action to be executed on either or both the '**actor**' and '**target**' entities.
bientity_action.markdownDescription: The action to be executed on either or both the '**actor**' and '**target**' entities.

bientity_condition.description: If specified, the specified action will only be executed if this condition is fulfilled by either or both '**actor**' and '**target**' entities.
bientity_condition.markdownDescription: If specified, the specified action will only be executed if this condition is fulfilled by either or both '**actor**' and '**target**' entities.

damage_condition.description: If specified, the specified action will only be executed if this condition is fulfilled by the damage dealt by the '**actor**' entity.
damage_condition.markdownDescription: If specified, the specified action will only be executed if this condition is fulfilled by the damage dealt by the '**actor**' entity.
